## About CBASS

CBASS allows you to process CBASS data. To learn more about CBASS see <https://onlinelibrary.wiley.com/doi/10.1111/gcb.15148>.

## Load Packages

```{r library-packages}
library(CBASS)
```

## Load Data

Load the provided example dataset:

```{r load-data}
data("cbass_dataset")
head(cbass_dataset)
```

Make your data tidy and validate.

```{r process-and-validate-cbass-dataset}
cbass_dataset <- process_and_validate_cbass_dataset(cbass_dataset)
```
